title: Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Dentists Act 1985 (Special measures
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Dentists Act 1985 (Special measures 

registration having regard to Covid-19) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited dentist act 1985 (special measure registration regard covid-19) order 2020

title: Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the
heading: 2. The 31st of December 2020 is specified as the different date for the
text_raw:
2. The 31st of December 2020 is specified as the different date for the 

purposes of section 69(7) of the Dentists Act 1985. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 July, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [271] 3
text_norm: 2 31st december 2020 specified different date purpose section 69(7) dentist act 1985 given official seal 29 july 2020 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th august 2020 271 3

title: Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 31 December 2020 as the date on which a Section 69 
registration still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [271]
